jiraPrefix: Jira project prefix, only valid when `Enable Jira` is picked, e.g. PROJECT-
jiraUrl: Jira URL, only valid when `Enable Jira` is picked, e.g. https://jira.sample.com/browse/
larry-lan.gitCommitMessage.title: Git Commit Message
reporters:
Reporters
- `name`: Reporters name
- `email`: Reporters E-mail
- `picked`: Picked default

```json
[
  { "name": "Reporter", "email": "reporter@sample.com", "picked": true }
]
```
reporters.name: Reporters name
reviewers:
Reviewers
- `name`: Reviewers name
- `email`: Reviewers E-mail
- `picked`: Picked default

```json
[
  { "name": "Reviewer", "email": "reviewer@sample.com", "picked": true }
]
```
reviewers.name: Reviewers name
